member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets the background color of the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a structure that describes the background color.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetClipOverflow
member.summary: Determines whether a clip of text overflowed the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a value that specifies whether a clip of text overflowed the region. The variable specifies TRUE if the clip overflowed; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetDisplayAlignment
member.summary: Gets the display alignment of the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the display alignment of the region.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetExtent
member.summary: Gets the extent of the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the width of the region.
A pointer to a variable that receives the height of the region.
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the units in which the timed-text region is measured.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetLineHeight
member.summary: Gets the height of each line of text in the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the height of each line of text in the region.
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the units in which the timed-text region is measured.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetName
member.summary: Gets the name of the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the name of the region.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetPadding
member.summary: Gets the padding that surrounds the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the padding before the start of the region.
A pointer to a variable that receives the start of the region.
A pointer to a variable that receives the padding after the end of the region.
A pointer to a variable that receives the end of the region.
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the units in which the timed-text region is measured.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetPosition
member.summary: Gets the position of the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the X-coordinate of the position.
A pointer to a variable that receives the Y-coordinate of the position.
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the units in which the timed-text region is measured.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetScrollMode
member.summary: Gets the scroll mode of the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the scroll mode of the region.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetWrap
member.summary: Determines whether the word wrap feature is enabled in the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a value that specifies whether the word wrap feature is enabled in the region. The variable specifies TRUE if word wrap is enabled; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetWritingMode
member.summary: Gets the writing mode of the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the writing mode of the region.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion.GetZIndex
member.summary: Gets the Z-index (depth) of the region.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the Z-index (depth) of the region.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextRegion
member.summary: Represents the display region of a timed-text object.
